segments.text: The sunlight streaming through the window creates a picturesque view of the garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But here in the kitchen, it’s like a storm is brewing, hidden beneath the surface.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The plate in the woman's hand looks so delicate compared to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children’s laughter feels like a siren call, luring me into their moment of joy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet I find myself unsettled, watching the boy’s desperate stretch towards the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Every second feels like it could slip from joy to disaster in an instant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is tranquil and yet infused with an undercurrent of danger; it’s almost poetic.
segments.speaker: PAR
